page.title: 17Winmarleigh Field Day (2)
page.content: The{Procession}starts from the Patten Arms about 1.30 p.m. and arrives at the Village Hall in time for the old Queen to crown the new Queen at two. Speeches of thanks and appreciation are given,photographs taken,and then the real fun begins. During the afternoon we have{games}and {sports}and have goes on stalls and sideshows and by 4 o'clock we are ready for our tea.We can eat this much quicker than it took to make.After tea there is a lull when people go home to attend to animals and to change for the night. The night starts with a{Fancy Dress parade judged in several classes such as, funniest,most original and also by age.After the parade we have a{Disco} which lasts until midnight. The day after,Sunday,we all go to the Church when the Queen takes part.
